Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.util

Class MathUtil

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.util.MathUtil
public class MathUtil extends Object
A class containing multiple convenient math functions.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov
